title: Wheeling National Heritage Area: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions       Wheeling is one of the most accessible locations in West Virginia. Located on I-70 in West Virginiaâ€™s northern panhandle, Wheeling is about an hour from Pittsburgh, PA to the east, and two hours from Columbus to the west.  The Pittsburgh International Airport serves the need of air travelers.
